ProjectTitle: Dual catalysis approach for the carboxylation of aliphatic olefins using CO2 as the carbon source (2CCO2).
InitialFeedbackHistory: 12/06/2023 Please note that you used an older DMP template, VLAIO uses the [REDACTED] standard DMP template that you can find in DMPonline.be, please use this new template for your future DMPs [REDACTED] you mention that there are no restrictions for sharing, it may be easier to use a data repository for both data preservation and sharing, for example KU [REDACTED] RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) or a disciplinary repository if needed you can keep the files restricted and give access upon request, for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
